data.title: JACQUES DOILLON
data.meta_description: Director of MES SÉANCES DE LUTTE Born in Paris in ...
data.text:
Director of

MES SÉANCES DE LUTTE

Born in Paris in 1944. Began his career as an assistant editor of Alain Robbe-Grillet and shot several short films until he realized his first feature film, the episodic film L’ AN 01 (together with Alain Resnais and Jean Rouch), in 1973. The following 30 films gained him awards around the world. His works are regularly presented at the Viennale.

Films (selection): LA DRÔLESSE (1979), LA FILLE PRODIGUE (1981), LA PIRATE (1984), LE PETIT CRIMINEL (1990), PONETTE (1996), PETITS FRÈRES (1999), RAJA (2003), LE PREMIER VENU (2008), LE MARIAGE À TROIS (2010)
